original_text: If you go to her house, you are on the road to death. You will soon be in your grave.
korean_text: 그의 집은 스올의 길이라 사망의 방으로 내려가느니라

sentences.original_text: If you go to her house
you are on the road to death
You will soon be in your grave
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 곧 네 무덤에 있게 될 것이다
